TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProxyDataContractResolver extends System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver

Docs.summary: 針對為了[非持續性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)資料類別所建立的 Proxy 類型，此類別可協助將其解析為非持續性物件的實際類型。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public override Type ResolveName (string typeName, string typeNamespace, Type declaredType, System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver knownTypeResolver);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Type ResolveName(string typeName, string typeNamespace, class System.Type declaredType, class System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver knownTypeResolver) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ResolveName (typeName As String, typeNamespace As String, declaredType As Type, knownTypeResolver As DataContractResolver) As Type
public: override Type ^ ResolveName(System::String ^ typeName, System::String ^ typeNamespace, Type ^ declaredType, System::Runtime::Serialization::DataContractResolver ^ knownTypeResolver);

Docs.summary: 還原序列化期間，將任何 資訊對應到[非持續性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)物件的實際類型。
Docs.returns: 傳回 所對應至的型別。 如果找不到符合 的已知型別，則會傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱：[處理 POCO 實體](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5e0fb82a-b6d1-41a1-b37b-c12db61629d3)。

Docs.summary: 在還原序列化期間，將實際型別對應至 資訊。
